author: mattmills
post_text: June 7, 2014 at 11:08 PM#1Hello everyone, I currently have a macro that will remove a selected fixture, or fixtures, from my entire cue list but I was hoping someone might have a variation of it for me. Lets say I want to remove the selected fixtures from the current cue I'm on in the cue list and all the cues that follow it, what would the syntax be for that?

posts.author: mattmills
posts.post_text: June 7, 2014 at 11:08 PM#1Hello everyone, I currently have a macro that will remove a selected fixture, or fixtures, from my entire cue list but I was hoping someone might have a variation of it for me. Lets say I want to remove the selected fixtures from the current cue I'm on in the cue list and all the cues that follow it, what would the syntax be for that?

posts.author: ivers
posts.post_text: June 10, 2014 at 1:15 PM#2Remove selectionStore cue (current cue) thru /mThis will create a popup where it asks for the current cue number and it will remove the current selection from the cue number you enter and to the end of the cuelist.

title: Remove Macro
